Class.Name: Tree
Class.Description: Generic implementation of a tree data structure

Function.Name: add
Function.Description: Adds a child node to a node a path

Function.Name: remove
Function.Description: Reemoves a node identifed by a path

Function.Name: match
Function.Description: Searches for a node with a matching name

Function.Name: find
Function.Description: Finds a node at a particular path

Function.Name: get
Function.Description: Gets a node using a path notation. (New nodes are created if none exists).

Function.Name: traverse
Function.Description: Helper function to iterate through child nodes of a node and invoke a callback

Function.Name: dump
Function.Description: Dumps the tree to an output stream
